```{r setup}
library(alohaal)
library(tidyverse)
sbc_abundance$SIZE <-
  replace(sbc_abundance$SIZE, sbc_abundance$SIZE < 0, NA)
hist <- ggplot(data = sbc_abundance, aes(x = SIZE)) +
  geom_histogram(alpha = 0.5) + theme_minimal() + scale_fill_manual(values = c("dodgerblue1"))
hist
```
